Articles.Content:
Hey, since all your songs are on YouTube, I think you should make a playlist. (Sometimes I just want to play all of them together.) "Hey," you say, "That's a good idea!" So I made a playlist of all your KSP soundtrack music so far, just in case you don't get around to it for a while.

I intend to keep it updated as you create new stuff. Anyway, thank you for creating such wonderful music for KSP!

These soundtracks need more love.

OP, have you *TRIED* asking SQUAD to make them part of the game's soundtrack? Since you composed them yourself, you could offer them for free or a very small price...

Regards,

Northstar
Thanks, Upsilon. I agree with NorthStar (and just about everyone else), these would be excellent to be made official soundtrack pieces.
I'm not a fan of this. I prefer random BGM and mostly silence
I think Sun is my favorite so far.

I'm quite surprised the Interstellar soundtrack hasn't been mentioned yet. Some tracks are brilliant for certain scenarios (NTFC for a stressful docking, Wormhole for a Jool aerobrake and many others).

However, I personally prefer to keep to just the BGM, even if it does get a bit repetitive after a few hours.

Hey everyone!

Thanks for all the love. I personally enjoy SUN quite a bit, though it won't be complete until Avera9eJoe does a bit of work on it... which hasn't happened yet. I don't blame him: I'm really busy too, which is why I haven't been posting on the Forum as often.

SQUAD could use this music for free. I would be so enormously thrilled that they liked it that it would be worth more than any sum of money. I'm thinking of releasing a CD with some of this stuff on it at some point, maybe... but I don't want to charge people to have my music (it just seems wrong to do so). Maybe I could do a thing where you could download all tracks at highest quality for free, and then leave a donation if you wanted...

If SQUAD does incorporate this into the stock game (as some people seem to be pushing for), I would love to have it by various Easter eggs on planets and moons. It would make travelling there even more worthwhile.

I wish I had enough time to work on MUN. I have to write out a soundtrack for it so that other people know what to play, and I've never done that before (I improvised the solo for MINMUS on my first try )... it'll be a bit more time-consuming than normal.

Again, thanks for the feedback and the +Rep! You guys are the best.

-Upsilon

Yep, I know. I wish they wouldn't have plugged it, it needed a few more edits (and a significant volume boost) to be anything too presentable... but hey, I don't want to complain

Oh, and did you see your tiny Apollo replica got featured there too? I didn't notice that... nice job!

Would you mind if i used these in a (WIP) music plugin?

(Streaming from disk, planetary dependant music, WIP stuff )

Btw, awesome music! They fit really well in their respective planets!

Cheers!

Would you mind if i used these in a (WIP) music plugin?

(Streaming from disk, planetary dependant music, WIP stuff )

Btw, awesome music! They fit really well in their respective planets!

Cheers!

But of course! My music is Creative-Commons, meaning that you can do whatever you want with it.

Note, however, that the music will likely also be used in another plugin. If you don't mind that, then I'm okay with whatever you do.

Best of luck!

-Upsilon
Awesome stuff... I <3 the minmus theme. Had it on a loop for a couple hours on my last KSP session
I'm a cellist and a pianist, so if you need someone to play either gimme a hoot.
I love the Dres and Minmus themes. I want to learn an instrument now, just so I can help bring the rest of the themes out faster!

If you need any studio stuff (Mixing, mastering adding cool effects and ambiance and so on) send me a pm and I'll give you my email. Really like these tracks by the way.

EDIT: I encourage you to check out Koan Sound. their work with (synthesized) strings is incredible. sure, they're a bit weird, but I think you might like them.

Other tracks I like, and have a place here:

Interstellar theme by Hans Zimmer (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QFn2JcfKtJo)

Final Frontier (sun) by Thomas Bergersen (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0iteQE7KEyU)

No Time For Caution by Hans Zimmer (

)

Lost In Thought by Koan Sound (https://soundcloud.com/koan-sound/lost-in-thought)

Fire Away by Skrillex (

)

Chained by The Xx (

) Edited March 6, 2015 by SmallFatFetus
Adding More
I need this in my life! KSP needs a new soundtrack with one song for each planet.

here is a smooth tune that (to me at least) reminds me of KSP, for potential inspiration on new tracks.

any new ones coming down the line upsilon?

Edited April 5, 2015 by r4pt0r

here is a smooth tune that (to me at least) reminds me of KSP, for potential inspiration on new tracks.

any new ones coming down the line upsilon?

Funny that you should ask!

So, first of all, Avera9eJoe finished his percussion for SUN.

Video embedding is being really nasty for me, so the song might just be shown as a link. I'm deathly afraid of updating the OP because of this as well. Nonetheless, here's the compete version of the song:

If you want the audio file itself, let me know! I'll probably be able to get it out soon.

~~~

I really appreciate all of the music that's been recommended by y'all! I recently took a little while to listen to all of it, and it's really great stuff. Koan Sound is very much 'up my alley,' and I liked r4pt0r's track a lot as well (the beginning of it reminded me of the ubiquitous and very nice M83's 'Outro' song that's used all over the place). Good stuff.

I'm currently in the beginning phases of composing my next song, which will probably be either EELOO or MUN. I have themes for both playing in my head (at the same time!) and thus I know more-or-less what to do. If I can get even a little more organized, I'll probably write some sheet music and send it out to whoever plays the right instruments to be included in this. So expect PM-blasts in less than a week.

Sorry for not posting more here. Songs take a long time, and this semester at college has been taxing. I should actually be writing a paper right now, so I'll go and do that. Mustn't procrastinate!

-Upsilon

Wow. This is fantastic.

I can play piano. If you need that, then PM me or something.

Ok, midnight brain

Awesome songs tho, nice work.

It might work with this.

It works quite well indeed except tracks need to be converted to .ogg to work on Linux or Mac.

I'd love a download for Sun.

Edited May 9, 2015 by BigFatStupidHead

Wow, this is really awesome!

A few months ago I started my own KSP music project, but never got around to scoring "the planets."

Love your work!
The Sun sounds great with the percussion added!

The Sun sounds great with the percussion added!

Thank you! I'm glad you like it.
